entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
